comments.author: eolson@mozilla.com
comments.creator: eolson@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: Serverside logs for the 3 clients tested.  The only POST I see is for the tabs collection, which is expected.  There are quite a few GET requests thought that I would not expect to see, and aren't present on further sync sessions.
comments.text: Serverside logs for the 3 clients tested.  The only POST I see is for the tabs collection, which is expected.  There are quite a few GET requests thought that I would not expect to see, and aren't present on further sync sessions.

comments.author: eolson@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: Philip said that the extra GETs for client 1 & 2 were caused by the about sync add-on.  For the third client, he let it do an unattended sync and it was much less noisy.
comments.text: Philip said that the extra GETs for client 1 & 2 were caused by the about sync add-on.  For the third client, he let it do an unattended sync and it was much less noisy.
comments.creator: eolson@mozilla.com

comments.author: eolson@mozilla.com
comments.text: Full resync seems to be fixed, there are some outstanding concerns about bookmarks resyncing and incomplete history, closing this issue in lieu of this one -> https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1631787
